title: The Mated Queen
description:
She may have been born a human…
Eleanor never thought her life would be full of suspense, action or love. But that is exactly what she has gotten since her warrior claimed her.She now has powers, a father, and a lover. But more than that, she has an enemy who threatens to wipe out everything she holds dear.She will stop at nothing to save everyone she loves.
But she was destined to be his queen…
Danion craves nothing more than to be bonded to his mate. But the pain and suffering in her past threatens to destroy their bond before it even fully forms.While a war is raging all around them, Danion will have to win Eleanor’s trust or she will never be his mated queen.
author: E.M. Jaye
